Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value and great staff”
Reviews.Author: Skiingbuffy24
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is located on the Asian side of Istanbul and very close to the 2nd bridge. I have stayed here for about 20 nights since the start of 2012 and can only say whay good value for money the hotel offers. Great Spa and pool, area, very good 9th floor Club lounge and bedrooms of a 5 star standard. You can gain access to the Club lounge via a small upgrade charge or by paying â‚¬20 one off charge per day and for this you get drinks and snacks. For those visiting the main historic sights of Istanbul you need to be aware of the location of this new hotel but for those doing business on the Asian side the location is very good. Feel free to ask me any questions about this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice with excellent spa”
Reviews.Author: glukos
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel and looks very new. The rates are competitive and good value. Internet is also included in room rate which is good. The rooms are comfortable and nice. Only complaint was the housekeeping. You do not recognize it if you stay for one night but if you stay for 5 you will clearly see it needs improvment. I wrote detailed explanation about this in the survey of hotel and got personal email back where he infomred there would be invested in more training for house keeping so i am sure it will be improved on my next stay. I ordered room service and the food was delicious. I really loved the spa, and it is highly reccommended. the massages are excellent and i went there every day of my stay. The service in this hotel is very good and also more personal than some other hotels.I had a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very well done property”
Reviews.Author: gupta_subodh
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights in Jan 2012 + well decorated lobby + high levels of service + Even despite being vegetratian, was able to eat full meal as menu had enough veg continentail options + very eloberate breakfast spread + good location if you want to live close to Sabiha gocken or Asian side for business, but not for tourist who want to visit city centre - Room size was ok, but then thats what we paid for, bathroom very spacious

Reviews.Title: “Nice and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bony88
Reviews.Content: This new hotel is exactly what you are looking for when you are at a business trip at the Asian side of Istanbul. It is close to the airport, brand new, luxurious and classy. The staff is friendly and helpful. You have a large scale of options for breakfast. The rooms are very clean, comfortable and really nice.. This hotel will absolutely be my first preference at my next visit to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Very new and convenient for business area on Asian side”
Reviews.Author: Alexsas777
Reviews.Content: This hotel is of particular interest of those who are on business trips for companies with the offices in the business area on Asian side: there are quite a few companies. If you stay there, you avoid morning rush hour if you are getting from the European side by the bridge, and your life is safer as you don't need semi-crazy Turkish taxi drivers. the hotel itself is brand-new and has everything you can think of. It has got its very well deserve five stars, and is not overcrowded (probably, yet), or probably because it is not in a tourist area, though you can walk (30 mins) to Bosphorus where you can take a ferry to explore Istanbul from the water. Also there are few decent restaurants in the area (staff will help you to find them). Overall, great experience, highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and modern 5 star business hotel”
Reviews.Author: FirasES
Reviews.Content: It makes sense to say there if you have business on the Asian side nearby. Old city can only be reached by passing over the bridge that connects Asian to European side and this bridge has often traffic congestion, the same as many streets in city centre. The hotel lies in a quiet location with not much to do around there. It has also many nice facilities like a Turkish hammam and swimming pool. Rooms are beautiful and nicely equipped. Wifi connection is available for free.

Reviews.Title: “Funky!”
Reviews.Author: Rog_42
Reviews.Content: Stayed there twice now. The rooms are small(ish) but adequate. Very modern design and fittings with great rain-forest shower. No bath which is fine for me. Very nice bed with assorted pillows of different shapes, sizes and softness, which was a nice touch. Service was good, the location great for the New Bridge and overall this new hotel is very good. The decor and interior design is crazy, with a clash of styles that really works.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable hotel but far from anywhere”
Reviews.Author: Happytiler
Reviews.Content: Stayed just 2 nights. New property just around a year old near office blocks but away from anywhere much of interest so only handy if you are on business in the locality. Room was clean but on the small side but bed comfortable and bathroom nice enough. Breakfast plentiful and quite tasty. Room service was ok but limited choice. Would stay there again out of necessity but a bit soulless.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, wrong location.”
Reviews.Author: Kennethtravelling
Reviews.Content: Nice and new hotel located in Kavacik area on the asian side of Istanbul. Stayed here due to business at this side of town. It is only 20 min with taxi ( USD. 25,-) to Taksim Square when the traffice is normal. However that is rarely. During rush hour fom 16:00 - 21:00 the ride takes 60 - 90 min. If you need to be in this area of Istanbul I recon this would be the best choice by far. Service is very good and the breakfast buffet even better. If you are looking for a hotel in or near the city center the (only) choice would be in the Taksim area.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and stylish with good location on the asian side”
Reviews.Author: Veycu
Reviews.Content: The hotel is brand new and very stylish. I liked the design of the rooms very much. Staff was very friendly as well. It is good for business trips with a good connection to the european side by car. The only negative thing: the pool was very small, doesnt look like the picture on the website.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for Asian Side of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: karsiyakali_eatl
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for a business trip. The hotel's place is very convinient it is very close to the bridge so if you have to travel to European side, you don't have to wait to much. It is close to a pier as well so you can use sea for transportation...The hotel is very new and rooms and lobby are very clean and comforty. Its wi-fi is free of charge and its speed is fast as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for all business travellers while in Istanbul!!”
Reviews.Author: bayoglusinem
Reviews.Content: Great service, clean rooms, attention to details and welcoming and professional team with outstanding guest services

Reviews.Title: “great ...”
Reviews.Author: acb178
Reviews.Content: TOP QUALITY CITY HOTEL WITH IMPRESSING LOBBY I travel a lot around the world. I'm bored of trendy business hotels which all look alike and have no soul. I'm really impressed with the decoration of Limak Eurasia. Perfect blend of avantgarde and modern style. Service and rooms are equally excellent..

Reviews.Title: “Fansastic service!”
Reviews.Author: OlgaG417
Reviews.Content: I'm staying in Limak for a month. Feeling like at home. Hotel staff is very friendly, helpful and professional. Hotel is new and clean. Quality of food is superb. Locaion is convenient in terms of traffic.

Reviews.Title: “HIGHLY RECOMMEND DELUXE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: hilalustukk
Reviews.Content: I stayed Limak Eurasia for my recent visit to Istanbul. I really enjoyed my stay. Staff was incredibly hospitable and helpful. Room was perfect, comfortable and clean. You have to see really nice garden which you can not find any city hotel. I highly recommend the Limak Eurasia. I plan to go to Istanbul soon and Limak Eurasia will be my first choise.

Reviews.Title: “NICE HOTEL ON THE ASIAN SIDE”
Reviews.Author: AlperGuner
Reviews.Content: We were in Istanbul for business and had a perfect stay in Limak Eurasia for 4 nights. From Check-in to check out all staff were very helpful. Room was quite comfortable. There were coffee-tea utensils, bathrobes, slippers, welcome strawberry chocolate, turn-down service and many other amenities which give you the feeling that you are in a real deluxe hotel. We highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “One of my best business trips to Turkey”
Reviews.Author: CyrilGeneva
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel during my recent visit to Istanbul on business. Its convenient location was one of the reasons I chose Eurasia, and I did not regret the choice a single minute...far from the bustling city and its trafic but close to the area where my business was. My room was perfect; clean, quiet, comfortable and with free and good internet connection..All I needed for a good business stay.The restaurant is worth trying; very nice menu...I also had great tips from the Front desk for a few local fish restaurants, along the nearby Bosphorus shore. I enjoyed my stay very much, and hope you do too...

Reviews.Title: “One of the best in chain-hotels”
Reviews.Author: ska6364
Reviews.Content: I take international business-trips quite often and prefer to stay at international chain-hotels, whenever I can. My last trip in April took me to Istanbul, Turkey, where I stayed at the Limak Eurosia Hotel, due to its proximity to my business associates. My room was very quite and provided all the comfort one needs when travelling - including but not limited to a great bed, making me feel at home all together while being far away from home. The rich breakfast-buffet offered anything from salmon to bacon and more incl. probably one of the greates filtered coffee, which came to me, a serious coffee-connoisseur, as a great surprise. My special compliments must go to the hotel-staff, which was very attentive to all my needs throughout my stay and always genuinely warm. It is not very common in chain-hotels. I should especially mention the concierge Salih for his tireless help with all my questions and the breakfast hostess, Dila, whose smile never once disappeared when greeting each guest every morning. Next time Istanbulâ€¦I am staying at the Limak Eurasia again.

Reviews.Title: “style over substance! heating broke down, jacuzzi never worked, the manager is awful!”
Reviews.Author: dpk6
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for five days with a small child. My overall experience is has been very poor. Things constantly broke down and unfortunately it took hours of agony before they were fixed. On our first day the aircon didnt work and we waited four hours in a freezing room getting it fixed. On our second night the jacuzzi didnt work and we waited for two hours for them to fx it, yet they couldnt. They advertise a gym & spa on their internet site but you have to take a taxi to get to a local gym for this. It is a complete shambles! The first room they gave us had accumulated dust and used tissues under the bed. The floor manager offered to upgrade us to another room. Although I specifialy asked for a non-smoking room this upgraded room was clearly a smoking room as there was an obvious smell. When I pointed this out the manager pulled a face to me as if to say I was being unreasonable. He very hesitantly agreed to move us in an identical room at a different floor. As I have been with a small child I was getting very tired of this room hoping. Eventually we settled in our new room. However the air-con in this room was not working and we felt extremely cold. When I reported this it took them over three hours to get it semi worked. It was very cold and I was wrapped in blanket waiting for it to fixed! Not quite the 'luxury' they promise on their internet site. Meanwhile the manager offered us a bigger and better room at another floor and asked me to view it. This room was not even furnished yet! They suggested they would get it ready in no time. My child and I waited at the lobby. It had been seven hours since we checked in yet we still have not had a room to relax. It felt as if they were going thru trial and error in everything. After the room the manager offered us was ready he came over and explained that there would be additional charges for that room. I was extremely upset as I was waiting for hours to settle in a room and they tried to fool me by supposedly 'offering' an upgrade and then requesting further charges for it. At this stage if I hadn't pay for my entire stay upfront I would have happily move to another hotel.... We were assured the aircon was fixed in our previous room and we returned there. THis hotel has jacuzzis in the rooms -although in my opinion they would barely qualify for a whirlpool. And when we tried to use it, you guessed it, it was not working. WHen I reported this they sent a few technical staff to fix it. These people remained in my room over an hour and they couldnt even fix the thing. Furthermore these guys had such a bad smell I could not bare to breathe! Considering the hotel has been operational for only a few months I found uncleanness and poor quality of equipment unacceptable. On the positive, the reception staff esspecially Ozkan Bey is very polite and helpfull. But sadly that was not enough to give us a comfortable stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Limak Eurasia Luxury Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: | Kavacik, Istanbul, Turkey
